metadata.name: TERMINAL
metadata.description:
TERMINAL is a work that signifies an end point of liminal architecture. Spaces that are transitional challenge perceptions, and allow us to re-examine our relationship to the movement of time & energy.

The artwork features commercial advertising, disinfectants, liquid spills as stainless steel sculptures. It demonstrates how a well-designed space can affect our emotional and psychological states, and how it can create a sense of liminality that opens us up to new possibilities.
